name: DTS TRADING INC LTD
description: DTS Trading is a wholesaler of hygiene, medical disposables, and clothing products. DTS grew out of a retail business that focused on household consumable goods, moving into the wholesale market, approximately ten years ago.

jobs.title: BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT EXECUTIVE
jobs.description:
Position: BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT EXECUTIVE

Requirements: The ability to speak a foreign language (any European, African or Asian language is desired).

Desired: Previous experience in tele-sales role.

Company Roots

DTS Trading is a wholesaler of hygiene, medical disposables, and clothing products. DTS grew out of a retail business that focused on household consumable goods, moving into the wholesale market, approximately ten years ago.

About Us

DTS Trading is both a buyer and supplier of hygiene products, medical disposables, and clothing products in the international market. The business is separated into two distinct branches; one side dealing with hygiene and medical disposables and the other dealing with textile and clothing products. 

Our client base is spread across a number of different regions worldwide, with particular strong holds in West Africa, India and Mainland Europe.

Our head office is based in London, however we also have both manufacturing and warehousing 
facilities in the UK, Northern France, Greece and South East Asia where we handle a wide range of products on behalf of our clients.
